title: SPS Status for HL7 Order
description: Specifies SPS Status of DICOM MWL items created/updated on received HL7 ORM^O01, OMI^O23, OMG^O19 messages

hl7OrderControlStatus.title: HL7 Order Control Status
hl7OrderControlStatus.description: HL7 Order Control Status Code combinations. Enumerated values: NW_SC, NW_IP, CA_CA, DC_CA, XO_SC, XO_CM, SC_CM, SC_DC, SC_IP, SC_A
